front.title: ATM Virtual Circuit Identification Support for an RSVP-based Service

abstract.t: In this document we present a specification for associating RSVP flows with Virtual Connections on an ATM network. The text in this document is meant as an addendum to the text in Subsection 3.2 ``Sending RSVP Messages'' of the RSVP specification [Bzb+96]. This document specifies a usage of the Logical Interface Handle (LIH) in the RSVP_HOP Class Object when either a host or a router is attached to an ATM network. This document also specifies ATM UNI [For94] signaling semantics for associating a switched ATM connection with RSVP flows. These ATM UNI semantics use the Broadband High Layer Information (BHLI) Information Element.
